metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16853 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The DynamicMetadataProvider class in saml/saml2/metadata/impl/DynamicMetadataProvider.cpp in OpenSAML-C in OpenSAML before 2.6.1 fails to properly configure itself with the MetadataFilter plugins and does not perform critical security checks such as signature verification, enforcement of validity periods, and other checks specific to deployments, aka CPPOST-105.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16853` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsaml8v5 - 2.5.5-1ubuntu0.1
opensaml2-schemas - 2.5.5-1ubuntu0.1
opensaml2-tools - 2.5.5-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: opensaml2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.5-1ubuntu0.1').
